Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: My Pet Family

Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us

programme.title: Groups

Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: World of Toys

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom

programme.title: Pixie 2

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Small - But Hardworking
programme.desc: Three elves build a variety of different objects with materials such as wood and ice. This show is designed to be both educational and entertaining. It advances childrens imagination, by stimulating their senses with a bright colourful cartoon. Objects coming to life also enhances the focus on promoting creative imagination. This programme also aids children in beginning to recognise shapes.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: An educational show which teaches children everything they need to know about all sorts of animals, ranging from a familiar domestic cat or even the wildest of tigers found in the deepest of wildernesses. The programme explores how each and every one of these animals behaves, eats and plays and compares those characteristics to those us humans adopt.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Connected World
programme.desc: Join the children in this friendly multicultural day-care centre and learn about the diverse heritages of each of the toddlers. Learn where each of the pupils are from and even try to guess their nationalities from their clothing, favourite landmarks and special foods. Help them to narrate the stories and encourage them to be curious about new cultures, languages and countries.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Luna and her family travel through space, exploring the wonderful new worlds, planets and technologies they come across, whilst embarking on many fantastic space adventures.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: My Toys - My Friends
programme.desc: Go on adventures with this adorable teddy bear and all of his toy friends. My Toys My Friends helps young viewers to understand the categorisation of objects, promotes creativity and helps to develop social skills.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. programme.title: Lojistik Dunyası
programme.desc: Lojistik Dunyası, Asya, Avrupa ve Afrikanın kesişim noktasında lojistik merkezi ve jeo stratejik konumuyla enerji ve uretim malları geçişinde bulunan Turkiyenin Lojistik sektorundeki yerini uzmanlarla ve uygulayıcılar gozuyle değerlendirip sektore ışık tutuyor. Ayşegul Ketenci ile Lojistik Dunyası Pazar gunu saat 16:00da EKOTÜRKte.

programme.title: Marka Değeri
programme.desc: Turkiyenin ve dunyanın en guçlu markaları hangi değerleri temsil ediyor? Fark yaratan iyi fikirler ekonomik değere nasıl donuşur? Hangi markalara karşı duygusal bağ hissediyorsunuz? Eda Elif Özbek,Turkiyenin onde gelen markalarını, başarı hikayeleriyle ufkumuzu geliştiren, ulkenin ekonomik ve sosyal gelişimine katkı sunan isimlerle EKOTÜRK ekranlarında konuşuyor.

programme.title: Akla Ziyan

programme.title: Crafty Hands
programme.desc: The program is dedicated to learning English in a creative way. Chris Cole, the shows host, is teaching the little viewers how to make all kinds of things with their own hands from unneeded things at home, describing each step and all items in English. The new words appear on the screen. Kids learn English and develop their creative interest and imagination.

programme.title: Okey-Dokey
programme.desc: The programme is created for the younger viewers. By watching it the kids will learn some basic expressions and phrases. The main characters are cute aliens who help the kids learn, improve their abstract thinking skills, attention and memory while having fun and singing catching easy-to-remember English songs.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time is an animated childrens series telling stories that are set in a magical world, where only imagination can take you. Join in, and go on an amazing and fantastic journey. Find out about impossible things that only here exist, from fast snails and white ravens to talking goats, and much more.

programme.title: Words to Grow
programme.desc: A programme in which children are taught new English words through interactive lessons and playful activities featuring various realistic contexts and situations. Each lesson is accompanied by stimulating sounds and inspiring visuals to facilitate the learning process. Once the new words are explained and repeated, viewers are offered to take a short test to get a quick estimate of their progress.

programme.title: Yummy for Mummy

The questions are regarding the nuances of the language, such as usage of certain words that mean practically the same or sound similarly, yet have different connotations.

programme.title: This Day In History
programme.desc: This Day In History is a documentary series that looks back at historic events that took place on this day. We explore many different events that have had a lasting impact on society, whether in sport, politics, entertainment, art or science. Each episode is split into three parts, each featuring a short story about the event, letting viewers learn new English words and about fascinating pieces of history.

programme.title: Gadget-X
programme.desc: Hosted by Marvin, the programme provides a chance to get acquainted with the latest coolest gadgets, learn their names and main features and applications. The program is for intermediate students with some basic knowledge of the language.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Evolution is an educating program focusing on unusual facts about common things. As the clock is ticking, many things around us are changing. With the help of visual aids, you can easily remember lots of new words.

programme.title: Grammar Wise
programme.desc: English Club TV offers a perfect opportunity to improve your English and boost your skills. Grammar Wise is entirely dedicated to English Grammar, and shows you how to speak in the grammatically correct way. Follow your hosts as they take you through the various parts of this fascinating journey and acquaintance with the language logic, structure and rules.

programme.title: City Grammar
programme.desc: City Grammar is a program dedicated to walking the streets of London and learning English. By doing these exercises you will get to know culture, traditions and history of the British capital.

programme.title: Crafty Hands
programme.desc: The program is dedicated to learning English in a creative way. Chris Cole, the shows host, is teaching the little viewers how to make all kinds of things with their own hands from unneeded things at home, describing each step and all items in English. The new words appear on the screen. Kids learn English and develop their creative interest and imagination.

programme.title: Okey-Dokey
programme.desc: The programme is created for the younger viewers. By watching it the kids will learn some basic expressions and phrases. The main characters are cute aliens who help the kids learn, improve their abstract thinking skills, attention and memory while having fun and singing catching easy-to-remember English songs.

programme.title: Once Upon A Time
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time is an animated childrens series telling stories that are set in a magical world, where only imagination can take you. Join in, and go on an amazing and fantastic journey. Find out about impossible things that only here exist, from fast snails and white ravens to talking goats, and much more.

programme.title: Words to Grow
programme.desc: A programme in which children are taught new English words through interactive lessons and playful activities featuring various realistic contexts and situations. Each lesson is accompanied by stimulating sounds and inspiring visuals to facilitate the learning process. Once the new words are explained and repeated, viewers are offered to take a short test to get a quick estimate of their progress.

programme.title: Magic Science
programme.desc: English Club TV is a perfect chance to learn English or to improve the skills you already have. Program is for those kids who want to learn English in a fun and entertaining way through science experiments. Join the secret laboratory and have a look at chemical reactions, develop your memory skills and improve your vocabulary in the mysterious world of science.

programme.title: Alfred and Wilfred
programme.desc: The story is about two teenage brothers Alfred and Wilfred, who along with their best friends, often get into various ridiculous situations, gaining new life lessons along the way. programme.title: This Day In History
programme.desc: This Day In History is a documentary series that looks back at historic events that took place on this day. We explore many different events that have had a lasting impact on society, whether in sport, politics, entertainment, art or science. Each episode is split into three parts, each featuring a short story about the event, letting viewers learn new English words and about fascinating pieces of history.

programme.title: Labour of Love
programme.desc: The series is dedicated to people who are extremely passionate about some creative work or hobby, from stitching portraits and painting dishes to performing songs, modelling plus-size clothes. Explore their world and get motivated, and at the same time boost your skills of listening and expand your vocabulary.

programme.title: What Did They Say
programme.desc: Get analysis of speeches and presentations by famous personalities, so you understand exactly what they say and mean. Watch the presentation of V2 with Elon Musk, find out secret of movie industry with Quentin Tarantino, get inspired by the motivational speech of Steve Jobs and boost your listening skills and enlarge your vocabulary.

programme.title: Grammar Wise
programme.desc: English Club TV offers a perfect opportunity to improve your English and boost your skills. Grammar Wise is entirely dedicated to English Grammar, and shows you how to speak in the grammatically correct way. Follow your hosts as they take you through the various parts of this fascinating journey and acquaintance with the language logic, structure and rules.

programme.title: English Is the Key
programme.desc: The educational programme consists of a series of common situations dialogues from every day life. You will be able to handle various situations, like buying tickets, ordering food, shopping and so on. The videos have subtitles, the hosts repeat the key words and expressions several times, so you can easily learn the correct pronunciation and meaning of words and phrases.

programme.title: City Grammar
programme.desc: City Grammar is a program dedicated to walking the streets of London and learning English. A tour of London is combined with exploring and studying a very important and necessary language sphere- Grammar. Here on Londons streets you will find fantastic grammar examples and exercises. By doing these exercises you will get to know culture, traditions and history of the British capital.

programme.title: Basic Lexis

programme.title: Bayan Fisherın Modern Cinayet Gizemleri

programme.title: Murdoch Gizemleri

programme.desc: 1970ler İngilteresinde geçen dizi, gizemli bir dedektif olan Dedektif Jamesin perspektifinden anlatılıyor ve sıra dışı cinayetlerin gizemini çozen Dalglieshin kariyerini gunumuzde takip ediyor.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gauisun hukumdarlığı bir kızın hayattan bekleyebileceklerinin kitabını yazan ve dunyanın en guçlu kadınlarından birine donuşen eşi Livia Drusillanın hayatı uzerinden anlatılır.

programme.title: Domina
programme.desc: Gauisun hukumdarlığı bir kızın hayattan bekleyebileceklerinin kitabını yazan ve dunyanın en guçlu kadınlarından birine donuşen eşi Livia Drusillanın hayatı uzerinden anlatılır.

programme.title: Agatha Christienin Marpleı
programme.desc: Amator dedektif Bayan Jane Marpleın bir çok cinayet gizem macerasına katılın; oldukça analitik bir zihne sahip olan Marple bir şekilde etrafındaki gizemli suçları ve cinayetleri kendine çekiyor gibi gorunuyor.

programme.title: Murdoch Gizemleri
programme.desc: 1890lar: Murdoch, şehrin en korkunç cinayetlerinden bazılarını çozebilmek için donemin en radikal forenzik tekniklerini kullanıyor. Bunların arasında parmak izi ve kanıt takibi de bulunuyor.

programme.title: Murdoch Gizemleri
programme.desc: 1890lar: Murdoch, şehrin en korkunç cinayetlerinden bazılarını çozebilmek için donemin en radikal forenzik tekniklerini kullanıyor. Bunların arasında parmak izi ve kanıt takibi de bulunuyor.

programme.title: Dedektif George Gently
programme.desc: Guçlu bir adalet duygusu olan Başkomiser George Gently, Northumberlandın çarpıcı yamaçları ve kıyılarında genç komiser Bacchusun yardımıyla suçları aydınlatmak için çalışıyor.

programme.title: Futbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turkiye Super Ligi, Turkiyenin en yuksek profesyonel futbol ligidir. Bu lig 1957de kuruldu ve şu anda 18 kulupten oluşuyor. Puan tablosunu birinci sırada tamamlayan takım, UEFA Şampiyonlar Ligi grup aşamasına doğrudan yerleşiyor.

programme.desc: Avrupanın en prestijli kadın basketbol yarışması olan Kadınlar Euroleaguein maçlarını takip edin!

programme.title: Basketbol: Euroleague
programme.desc: EuroLeague, sponsorluk adıyla Turkish Airlines EuroLeague, Avrupada 2000den beri Euroleague Basketball tarafından duzenlenen en ust duzeydeki ve kazananın Avrupa Şampiyonu olarak adlandırıldığı uluslararası profesyonel basketbol turnuvası

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

programme.title: How i Met Your Mother
programme.desc: How I Met Your Mother, Ted (Josh Radnor) ve nasıl aşık olduğu ile ilgili bir komedi. Her şey Ted’in en yakın arkadaşı Marshall’ın (Jason Segel) uzun suredir birlikte olduğu anaokulu oğretmeni kız arkadaşı Lily’e (Alsyson Hannigan) evlenme teklif etmeye karar vermesiyle başlıyor. Gerçek aşkı bulmayı umut eden Ted’e, tescilli bekar arkadaşı Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), çılgın ve arsız yontemleriyle, kadınlarla tanıştırarak yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Ted, Robin (Cobie Smulders) ile tanışıyor ve bunun ilk goruşte aşık olduğuna oldukça emin. Fakat kaderin Ted için farklı planları var.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Barry Josephson ve Hart Hanson’ın yapımcılığı ile Angel dizisinden tanıdığımız David Boreanaz’ın başrolde olduğu Bones, gerçek hayattan esinlenilerek çekilmiş bir drama. Bir antropolog ve roman yazarı olan Dr. Temperance Brennan, Jeffersonian Institution’da, kurbanların kemiklerini inceleyerek cinayetleri çozumlemeye çalışıyor. Kimlik belirlemede standart metotlar işe yaramaz olduğunda, adli tıp ekipleri Brennan’dan yardım istiyor. Özel ajan Seeley Booth ile profosyonel bir ekip gibi çalışsalar da, ilk gunden beri aralarındaki kimya apaçık ortada. Cinayet çozumlerinde son teknolojileri kullanarak ilerleyen bu ekibin maceraları, oldukça etkileyici.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Justin Hartley, geçmişte yaşadığı sorunlardan dolayı içgudulerini geliştirmiş ve bu yeteneklerini kayıp insanları bulmak ile odulleri toplamak için kullanan Colter Shaw karakteriyle geri donuyor. Hukuk danışmanı Reenie Green (Fiona Rene), iş yoneticisi Velma Bruin (Abby McEnany) ve teknoloji uzmanı Bobby Exley (Eric Graise) tarafından desteklenen Colter, bu sezon da işi tamamlamak için hiçbir şeyden kaçınmayacak.

Özel ajan Seeley Booth ile profosyonel bir ekip gibi çalışsalar da, ilk gunden beri aralarındaki kimya apaçık ortada. Cinayet çozumlerinde son teknolojileri kullanarak ilerleyen bu ekibin maceraları, oldukça etkileyici.

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Sevgilisinden yeni ayrılan Jess, uç erkekle birlikte aynı eve taşınmak zorunda kalır. İnsan ilişkilerinde pek başarılı olamayan Jess, evde geçirdiği sure içerisinde hem kendini geliştirme fırsatı bulacak, hem de erkeklerin dunyasını yakından tanıyacaktır.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Bir suçluyu en kestirme yoldan nasıl yakalarsınız? Tabii ki bir suçlu gibi duşunerek ve onun psikolojisine gore hareket edip, ipuçlarını birleştirerek. Virginia Quanticodaki Davranış Analizi Ünitesinde çalışan ozel bir ekibin uzmanlık alanı suçlu beyinleri analiz etmek. Onların işi, suç mahalli ya da laboratuvar deneyleri ile bitmiyor, her bir karmaşık davayı çozerken yap-boz parçalarını birleştiriyorlar.

programme.title: How i Met Your Mother
programme.desc: How I Met Your Mother, Ted (Josh Radnor) ve nasıl aşık olduğu ile ilgili bir komedi. Her şey Ted’in en yakın arkadaşı Marshall’ın (Jason Segel) uzun suredir birlikte olduğu anaokulu oğretmeni kız arkadaşı Lily’e (Alsyson Hannigan) evlenme teklif etmeye karar vermesiyle başlıyor. Gerçek aşkı bulmayı umut eden Ted’e, tescilli bekar arkadaşı Barney (Neil Patrick Harris), çılgın ve arsız yontemleriyle, kadınlarla tanıştırarak yardımcı olmaya çalışıyor. Ted, Robin (Cobie Smulders) ile tanışıyor ve bunun ilk goruşte aşık olduğuna oldukça emin. Fakat kaderin Ted için farklı planları var.

programme.title: Tracker
programme.desc: Justin Hartley, geçmişte yaşadığı sorunlardan dolayı içgudulerini geliştirmiş ve bu yeteneklerini kayıp insanları bulmak ile odulleri toplamak için kullanan Colter Shaw karakteriyle geri donuyor. Hukuk danışmanı Reenie Green (Fiona Rene), iş yoneticisi Velma Bruin (Abby McEnany) ve teknoloji uzmanı Bobby Exley (Eric Graise) tarafından desteklenen Colter, bu sezon da işi tamamlamak için hiçbir şeyden kaçınmayacak.

programme.desc: Olağanustu zeki bir bekâr anne Los Angeles Emniyetinin Buyuk Suçlar birimine kabul edilir ve suçları çozmedeki sıra dışı becerisi sayesinde, kurallara uyan emektar bir dedektifle alışılmadık ve engel tanımaz bir ortaklık kurar.

programme.title: Muzakere
programme.desc: Turkiyenin ve dunyanın gundemini belirleyen gelişmeler, Ankara kulislerinde konuşulanlar, karar alanların goruşu ve karşı çıkanların itirazları, Turkiyenin fikir onderleri ve konunun uzmanlarıyla Muzakerede.

programme.desc: Turkiye ve dunyada gece yaşananlar, son dakika gelişmeleri ve geride kalan 24 saatin yeni gune taşıdıkları, haberlerle, açıklamalarla, uzmanların değerlendirmeleriyle hafta içi her gun 06.00da Elif Özkul ile "Turkiyede Sabah"ta.

programme.title: Airport
programme.desc: Havacılık ve turizm programı Airportta, Turkiye ve dunya sivil hava teknolojisindeki gelişmeler, yeni teknolojiler, hizmetler ve urunler hakkında bilgi veriliyor. Sivil havacılık kuruluşlarının yoneticileriyle soyleşiler gerçekleştiriliyor.Guntay Şimşekin hazırladığı program, havayolu şirketleri, havalimanı işletmecileri ve yer hizmetleri firmalarının çalışmalarını ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Burası Hafta Sonu
programme.desc: Canlı bağlantılar, sıcak haberler, Turkiye ve dunya gundeminin satır aralarındaki çarpıcı detaylar, her hafta çok ozel isimlerle gundem oluşturacak ve çok konuşulacak sohbetler... Hepsi Murat Guloğlunun sunumuyla Burası Hafta Sonunda ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Mucize Hayat
programme.desc: Prof. Dr. Engin Çakar ile Mucize Hayat, Haberturk TVde bu hafta da merak edilen sağlık konularını ekrana taşıyor.Yuz kaslarına iyi gelen beş basit egzersizi uzmanlar studyoda gosteriyor. Prostat kanseri ne sıklıkta goruluyor? Hangi şikayetlerde uroloji uzmanına gidilmeli? Prostat cerrahisinde yeni yontemler neler? Üroloji Uzmanı Prof. Dr. Murat Binbay anlatıyor.Evde robotik fizik tedavi nasıl yapılıyor? Öğretim uyeleri Dr. Barkın Bakır ve Dr. Ulvi Başpınar açıklıyor.

programme.title: El Sanatları

programme.title: Çizgi Film
programme.desc: Minik izleyiciler için ekrana getirilen "Çizgi Film" kuşağı, eğlenceli ve renkli içerikleriyle çocuklara keyifli anlar yaşatıyor. Sevimli karakterlerin maceraları, dostluk, paylaşma, dayanışma ve hayal gucunu geliştiren hikâyelerle bir araya geliyor. Çocukların hem eğlenip hem oğrenmesini sağlayan bu ozel yayın kuşağı, ailelerin guvenle tercih edebileceği bir içerik sunuyor. "Çizgi Film", gunun farklı saatlerinde çocukların dunyasına neşe katmaya devam ediyor.

programme.title: Ülkede Bu Sabah
programme.desc: Gune erken başlayanların programı "Ülkede Bu Sabah", Şahin Karakayanın sunumuyla hafta içi her sabah 07:00de Ülke TV ekranlarında!

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Necmettin Nursaçanla Sohbetler
programme.desc: Ekranların başarılı ismi Muhsin Bayın sunumu ve Emekli Diyanet İşleri Başkan Yardımcısı Necmettin Nursaçanın sade ve anlaşılır sohbetiyle ekranlara gelen Nursaçanla Sohbetler, İslamiyete dair tum merak edilenleri cevaplıyor.

programme.title: Evlerinize Sağlık
programme.desc: Sağlıklı yaşama dair ipuçlarının ekrana taşındığı Dr. Feridun Kunakla Evlerinize Sağlık, her Cumartesi saat 12:00de Kanal 7 ekranlarında.

programme.title: Gunduz Gece
programme.desc: Sevilen turkucu Kurşatın eğlenceli sunumuyla Anadolunun saklı kalmış guzelliklerini ekrana getiren Gunduz Gece turuna hız kesmeden gezmeye devam ediyor. Memleket hasreti çekenlerin ozlemini dindirmek isteyen Gunduz Gece, Anadolu topraklarının guzelliklerini karış karış dolaşarak Kanal 7de ekrana taşıyor.

programme.title: Dunyanın Tadı
programme.desc: Dunya mutfaklarından farklı lezzetlerin ve yemek kulturlerinin ekrana taşındığı Dunyanın Tadı, Yasin Esirgençin sunumuyla izleyiciyle buluşuyor. İlginç yemek alışkanlıkları, birbirinden farklı lezzetler ve eşi benzeri gorulmemiş yiyecekler Dunyanın Tadında ekrana getiriliyor.

programme.title: Harunla Şen Yollar
programme.desc: Anadolunun samimiyetini, insan sıcaklığını ve kulturel zenginliğini ekranlara taşıyan "Harunla Şen Yollar", 18 Ekimden itibaren her Cumartesi saat 16:20de Kanal 7deki yerini alacak.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Hafta Sonu Haberleri
programme.desc: Hulya Seloninin sunduğu Haftasonu Haberlerinde, bir haftada, Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan gelişmeler, son dakika haberleri, ozel dosyalar ve birbirinden ilginç haberler yer alıyor. Turkiye ve dunya gundeminde yaşananları ve haftaya damgasını vuran olayları uzman konukların da bakış açısıyla gormek istiyorsanız Hulya Seloniyle Haftasonu Haberlerini sakın kaçırmayın...

programme.title: Üç Kız Kardeş
programme.desc: Turkan, Donuş ve Derya... Üç kız kardeş, anne ve babalarıyla mutlu bir hayat surerken Turkanın yaptığı evlilikle birlikte kara bulutlar ailenin ustunde gezinmeye başlayacak, artık hiçbir şey eskisi gibi olmayacaktır. Turkan, mahsur kaldığı masalsı şatoda mutsuzluğuna kılıflar dikmeye çalışırken Donuşun hayatı, geçmişten gelen buyuk sırla alt ust olacak, Derya da donuşu olmayan bir yola adım atacaktır.

programme.title: Yabancı Damat
programme.desc: Gaziantepin unlu baklavacısı Kahraman Ustanın kızı Nazlı, Ankara da universite eğitimini bitirmiş memleketine donmuştur. Nazlı yakışıklı, yabancı bir gençle tanışır. Bu genç, ailesi İstanbuldan Atinaya goç etmiş Niko adında bir Yunanlıdır. Nazlı ve Niko birbirlerine deliler gibi aşık olurlar. Ancak Nikonun ailesi Turklerden, Nazlının ailesi de Yunanlılardan pek hoşlanmamaktadır...

programme.title: Konuştukça
programme.desc: Sunuculuğunu Özlem Yıldız yaptığı programda sağlıktan doğal yaşama, guzellikten kişisel bakıma, eğitimden psikolojiye kadar her şey konuşuluyor.

programme.title: Magazin D Cumartesi
programme.desc: Ünlulerin en ozel sırları, hiçbir yerde izleyemeyeceğiniz roportajlar, magazin dunyasındaki en son gelişmeler ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Ardanın Mutfağı
programme.desc: Menude bu hafta çok lezzetli bir Kori Soslu Tavuk, yan yemeklerin vazgeçilmezi olacak bir Sebzeli Kuskus, her şeye hafiflik katacak bir Ispanak Pestolu Domates ve bir yiyenin bir dilim daha isteyeceği Yanık Tereyağlı Brownie var!

programme.title: Arka Sokaklar
programme.desc: Ali, Cevherin elinden kurtulur. Cevher yanına sadık adamı genç Balabanı alarak peşine duşer. Barış ekipte kalıp kalmama konusunda kararını vermiştir ve bunu Rızayla konuşur.Ali için endişelenen Pınar çocukları da alarak İstanbula gelir. Ancak Alinin beklenmedik hamlesi tum ekibi teyakkuza geçirecektir.

programme.title: Uzak Şehir
programme.desc: Cihan, ameliyata girme mecburiyetlerini Alyaya anlatamadığı her an biraz daha kendini koşeye sıkışmış hissetmesine neden olur. Aralarındaki tartışma iyice buyuyunce Alya oğluyla beraber konaktan ayrılmak zorunda kalır. Ecmelle Demir, Cihanın nasıl bir sınavdan geçtiğinden habersiz, ona karşı kanlı bir oyun kurmanın peşindedirler.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Haber Haftasonu, Merve Dinçkolun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Guller ve Gunahlar
programme.desc: Serhat, Hayalin oğrendikleri ile alt ust olurken Cihan ise Ebrunun beklenmedik hamlesi ile uğraşmaktadır. Berrakla ilgili gelen yeni bir bilgi Zeynep ve Serhatı harekete geçirirken Tibetin onlar için planladığı şeyden haberleri yoktur. Serhat, yeni bir bilginin peşinde koşarken hastaneden gelen haberle bir seçim yapmak zorunda kalacaktır.

programme.title: Eşref Ruya
programme.desc: Dinçer, Eşrefin tuzağına duşmuş, çaresizce bir sonraki hamlesini hesaplar. Ancak Eşrefin gizli hayranıyla yuzleşmesine anlar kala hangarda gerçekleşecek bir patlama, herkesin planlarını alt ust eder. Kadir, operasyonunu yonetmek için yeni bir mekan arayışına girdiğinde, Eşref artık ona dur demenin vakti geldiğini anlar. Kadirin itibarını sarsacak buyuk bir hamle yapan Eşref, aynı zamanda piyasayı yasadışı maddelerden temizlemek için verdiği mucadelede yeni duşmanlarla karşı karşıya kalır.

programme.title: Vahşi Doğaya Donuş
programme.desc: Onlar Avrupanın en buyuk kara hayvanları ve kıtadaki en son yaban sığırı turu. Bir zamanlar Avrupa bizonu (aynı zamanda Wisent) olarak da bilinen bu canlılar eski dunyanın buyuk bolumunde varlık gostermişlerdi; ancak, Atlantikin obur yakasındaki yakın akrabalarının aksine, 20. yuzyılın başına gelindiğinde avlanma sonucu nesilleri tamamen tukenmişti. Gunumuzde, sadece iddialı doğaya donuş girişimleri sayesinde, bu buyuleyici hayvanları doğal habitatlarında tekrar gormek mumkun oldu.

programme.title: Malavi Doğal Hayatı Kurtarma
programme.desc: Dr. Amandanın vahşi bir kırmızı antilobu yakalamaya yonelik riskli girişimine hazırlanın. Daha sonra, vervet maymunları arasında huzursuzluk çıkarken mavi maymun Indigoyu kovalayın. Bumblefoot enfeksiyonu kapan bir kartal baykuşu inceleyin ve vahşi doğaya geri donen timsah Sheilaya elveda deyin.

programme.title: Orangutan Olmak
programme.desc: Taşıyıcı anneye ihtiyacı olan yetim bir bebek orangutan olan Topana hoş geldin deyin. Anaokulundaki oğrenme yolculuğunu, oğrenci arkadaşlarıyla birlikte ilkokul, ortaokul ve doğaya salınma okullarında ilerlerken izleyin. Bu sırada, 16 yaşındaki Kasper mezuniyete hazırlanıyor.

programme.title: Buyuk Kedi̇ler, Kuçuk Dunya
programme.desc: Kış selleri geldiğinde yavru bakımı yuzunden bitkin duşen Molelonun surusunu izleyin. Zor bir karar veren çita yavrularına goz atın ve leopar anne Sephirinin eski ailesi ile yeni yavruları arasında seçim yaptığı dehşetli karşılaşmaya tanık olun.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim bir grup gladyatoru Afrika savanlarındaki bir su birikintisine getirdiğinde değerli kaynaklar uzerindeki çatışmalara tanık olun. Aslan ve fil arasındaki bolge kavgasını, bir termit tepesine yapılan karınca baskınını ve bir bal porsuğunun olumcul bir yılanla yaptığı riskli dansı gorun.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Avustralyanın en zeki gladyatorlerine ve etkileyici cephaneliklerine karşı mucadele edin. Kangurunun olumcul boks hareketleri ve kırmızı sırtlı orumceğin hassas muhendislik urunu tuzakları gibi silahların iklim değişikliğinin tahribatından kurtulmalarına yardımcı olup olamayacağını oğrenin.

programme.title: Ol Pejata Gunlukleri
programme.desc: Siyah Gergedan dunyadaki en tehlike altında olan turlerden biri ve buyuk bir hızla olmeye başlamaları uzerine, Ol Pejata çok geç olmadan bu olumlerin nedenini anlamak için uzmanlığını uygulamaya koyuyor.

programme.title: Yabani Vadi
programme.desc: Nehrin en buyuk kıvrımını yoneten dev bir su aygırı olan sahil efendisiyle savaşın. Nsefu aslan surusunun yemek arayışında olmasından dolayı, diğer yaratıkların kaçmasına tanık olun; ta ki bir Nil timsahı akşam yemeklerini çalmaya karar verene kadar.

programme.title: Afrika Su Dunyası
programme.desc: Guney Afrikadaki mangrov ormanını ve onun sakinlerini gelgitler arasındaki geçiş donemleri boyunca izliyoruz. Ormanı demiz tutarak, çeşitli turlere yemek ve barınak sağlamasına yardımcı olan kızıl pençeli mangrov yengeçleriyle tanışıyoruz.

programme.title: Afrika Su Dunyası
programme.desc: Okavango Deltasındaki, Afrikanın en bereketli ve çeşitlilik içeren doğal hayat alanlarından birine goz atın. Deltanın işleyiş biçimini irdeleyin ve bu alanda yaşayan çeşitli, ilgi çekici turler hakkında bilgi edinin.

programme.title: Afrika Su Dunyası
programme.desc: Afrikanın en guney batı ucunda, olağandışı bir Afrika penguenleri kolonisi yaşar. Çoğu Afrika pengueni bolgenin kıyıdan uzaktaki adalarında uremeyi tercih eder; ancak insanların onların yuvalarına mudahale etmesi nedeniyle birçok kuş uygun ureme alanları bulmak için başka yerlere gitmektedir.

programme.title: Afrika Su Dunyası
programme.desc: Afrika savanalarında yaşamın hakimi sudur. Uzun kurak mevsim boyunca, hayat veren nehirler kurur ve çetin kuraklık koşulları bolgeye egemen olur. Boylece su birikintileri kalabalıklaşır.

programme.title: Koalanın Gizli Yaşamı
programme.desc: Koalalar, Avustralyanın en tanınan keseli hayvanlarından olmakla birlikte, sadece bu kıtanın doğu ve guneydoğu kesimlerinde yaşarlar. Onların bu farklı bolgelerdeki yaşamları ve davranışlarının nasıl değişkenlik gosterdiğini oğrenin.

programme.title: Koalanın Gizli Yaşamı
programme.desc: Koalalar yalnız ve hareketsiz gorunebilir, ancak çiftleşme mevsimi onların davranışlarında çarpıcı bir değişiklik getirerek, harekete, temasa ve çatışmaya neden olur. Yavrulama mevsimi başlarken, iki buyuk erkek koalanın eş bulma gorevlerine tanık olun.

programme.title: Afrikanın Buyuk Parkları
programme.desc: Guney Afrika, Zululandın merkezinde Afrika kıtasının en eski yabani hayvan rezervi bulunur Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Guneyli beyaz gergedanlar çalkantılı donemlerde insanlardan kaçarak buraya sığındılar. 19. yuzyıl sonunda av nedeniyle neredeyse soyu tukenen beyaz gergedanlar, parkın kurulmasıyla yeni bir yaşam kaynağı buldu ureyerek tukenmekten kurtuldu.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Hudson Korfezi alçak toprakları Kuzey Amerikadaki en buyuk sulak arazidir. 300.000 kilometrekareden geniş, yosunlarla ortulu bu devasa bataklık goz alabildiğine uzanır ve suya batmış turba, yosun ve bodur ağaçlarla doludur. Bir zamanlar kurak alan olarak gorulen bataklıkların dunyadaki yaşam için hayati onemi yeni yeni anlaşılıyor. Kuresel çapta, bataklıklarda tutulan karbon dioksit miktarı atmosferdekine neredeyse eşittir. Turbalık alan ekosistemi dunyadaki en verimli karbon yutağıdır.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Dunyadaki son orneklerden biri olan Yukon gerçek bir doğal hayat bolgesi. Uçsuz bucaksız arazi adını bolgedeki yerli halklardan biri olan Gwich’in dilinde Yu-kun- ah veya koca nehir olarak ifade edilen en uzun nehirden alıyor. Kuzey Amerikadaki uçuncu en buyuk akarsu olan Yukon Nehri kuzeybatıya doğru, 3000 km boyunca, geniş, yayvan vadiler ve dar kanallar içinden akarak fırtınalı Bering Denizine akıyor.

programme.title: Kuzey Kutbunun Sırları
programme.desc: Tatnam Burnunda aylardan Kasım. Kış Hudson Korfezinin aşağı batı yakasına geliyor. Ancak Hudson Korfezinde oluşması gereken buzdan eser bile yok. 2016 yılı tarihte kaydedilen en sıcak yol oldu. Geçen Kasım ayında, sıcaklık ortalamaya gore 10 derece daha yuksekti. İklim değişikliği dunyanın kuzeyini kasıp kavuruyor. Sıfır santigrat derecenin hemen altındaki sıcaklıkta deniz donamıyor.

programme.title: Hindistanın Vahşi Doğası
programme.desc: Hoolock Gibbonları Hindistandaki balta girmemiş ormanların gerçek uzmanları. Sıkı bağlarla bağlı aile gruplarında yaşayan yavrular 9 yıl boyunca sağ kalmak için gereken tum becerileri ediniyorlar. Samarın, olağandışı yerlerde yiyecek bulmaktan, ağaçlarda yaşam için gereken akrobaside ustalaşmaya, nihayet ruştunu ispatlaması ve vahşi doğaya ilk adımını atmaya kadar olan oykusunu izliyoruz.

programme.title: Buyuk Kedi̇ler, Kuçuk Dunya
programme.desc: Çita Phefo ve aslan Tshabanın yavrularına hayatta kalma becerilerini oğrettiği ve onları buyuk erkek kedilerden koruduğu Gomoti Nehrinde baharı karşılayın. Leopar Senatia mirasını korumaya çalışırken aslan kral Molelonun savaşa girmesini izleyin.

programme.title: Buyuk Kedi̇ler, Kuçuk Dunya
programme.desc: Kış selleri geldiğinde yavru bakımı yuzunden bitkin duşen Molelonun surusunu izleyin. Zor bir karar veren çita yavrularına goz atın ve leopar anne Sephirinin eski ailesi ile yeni yavruları arasında seçim yaptığı dehşetli karşılaşmaya tanık olun.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Waterfront Pride ile tanışın Erkekler Tom Tom ile Caller, 8 dişi aslan, 10 genç ve evini bekleyen yetişkin yavru Einstein. Einsteinın efelenmesine Outsiders Pridelı rakiplerinin onun kaderini çizen hamleleriyle verdikleri karşılığa tanıklık edin.

programme.title: Suru Kuralları
programme.desc: Kuraklık onları (ve avlarını) olumcul bir tehlikeye atarken surunun yiyecek için avlandığı anlardaki gerilimi hissedin. Einsteinin yalnızlığa adapte oluşunu izleyip yeni anne Kalwezinin yavruları için verdiği mucadelenin hasar tespitini yapın.

programme.title: Afrikanın Avcıları
programme.desc: Baskın erkekler yakın bolgelerde dolaşırken, avlanma gorevi Mwamba surusunun dokuz guçlu dişi aslanına duşuyor. Yağmur mevsiminin yaklaşmasıyla ve sınırsız iştahlarıyla buyuyen altı genç yavru ile nasıl başa çıktıklarını gorun.

programme.title: Afrikanın Avcıları
programme.desc: Dişi aslanlar bufalo avlamak için gerekli olan erkekleri kurtarmak için yola çıktıklarında, timsah dolu bir nehri geçmek zorundadır. Mwamba surusunun tek yavrusu olan Miloyu, timsahlardan kurtulurken ve ailenin geleceğini sağlamlaştırırken izleyin.

programme.title: Afrikanın Avcıları
programme.desc: Kuçuk Nsefu surusu hayatta kalmak istiyorsa, genç Misfit ve ağabeyi avcılık becerilerini hızla mukemmelleştirmelidir. Aslanlar av arayışında baskın rakipler ve guçlu bir sırtlan klanıyla karşılaştıkça duşman bolgesine doğru yuruyun.
